Had to air them outside for a few days, turned inside out and left out in the sun for UV cleaning, and then washed them, all before the smell was mitigated sufficiently.  That aside, great for the price.

评论概述: Nice Pants and the odor went away.
评论详情: The man reason I wanted to write a review was to address the odor problem of these pants. They do smell like dead fish inside. I read a review that said they washed them twice and could not get the odor out.  So, I turned them inside out and hung them outside on a clothes line outside. The odor was completely gone in a few hours. I think the person who tried to wash them set the chemical in deeper.  They fit great and yes, these are not for summer, but what "leather" pants are?  They will work great for my vampire look this Halloween.

评论概述: Finally got my first of many
评论详情: I’ve always wanted to get leather or leather like pants, finally let myself honor this desire with this first pair.  I love these pants. A manifestation come to fruition. Finally can dress the part of rockstar that I am.  I love how I feel in them and have worn them since I got them. Fit just as expected and I like the tight grip.  Already got my second pair, fits differently but fun, too, with the lace up leg.  Bonus, easy to clean many simple spills.  As for smell, starts that way likely due to preservative treatment used to keep garment safe until it’s gets to your door.  Simple fix: mix half distilled white vinegar with half water and spray outside/wipe. Best also to machine wash cold water delicate in a mesh garment bag and hang dry. Mix in a bit of white vinegar in the garment bag or inside pants before to also deodorize inside.  Enjoy. I’m getting more.

I bought these pants and I am in love with them. They are surprisingly comfortable and shine up nicely with a little leather lotion (they're faux leather but it still works nicely). They squeak and creak a little when walking around, but nothing terribly noticeable. I'm a very small person (4'9") and the size 29 fits as expected. They are long on me, but I just tuck in the bottom. One thing to note is that the pants do not come pre-laced, so you can adjust how tight you want the legs to be. Also my pair did not have a funky smell at all. I would definitely recommend! Great for a Blackbeard costume!
